title: Pirate Storm Master - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mystery   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Empires   Fanfiction   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Martial Spirits   Pirates
author: 沐木青陽
description:
Lin Yu accidentally crosses into the pirate world and becomes the prince of Alabasta and Vivi’s brother.

A sword light fell from the sky at the old nest of the Baroque Works, directly dividing the entire base in half.

“Oh, Sir Crocodile, I heard that you are planning on doing something to Alabasta, come and let us talk about it.” Before the ruins, Lin Yu stopped Crocodile who was about to escape.>
